page.title: 20LIFE STYLES
page.content: AN ADDRESS NO LONGER GIVES EVIDENCE OF "LIFE STYLE" AS IT MAY IN URBAN AREA, "HEATHFIELD" LORD RANKS OLD HOUSE IS NOW DIVIDED INTO FLATS,A FARM HOUSE MAY BE ONLY A HOUSE.{THE INCREASE IN {COMMUTERS/MIGRANTS OPERATES AGAINST {THE WEEKDAY MEETINGS OF ALL TYPES NOW CHURCH CONGREGATIONS HAVE DROPPED, AS EVERYWHERE,AT ALL CONVENTIONAL SERVICE EXCEPT THE "BIG FESTIVALS".{SOME {CHURCHES RUN FAMILY SUNDAYS,CHILDRENS {OR THEME SERVICES WHICH ARE CONSIDERED {MORE INTERESTING.}RESPONSE TO UPKEEP OF BUILDINGS,PLAY PARKS,WILDLIFE AND RETENTION OF OUR FEW AMENITIES IS TREMENDOUS.{MUCH LEADERSHIP TO VILLAGE {LIFE STEMS STILL FROM CHURCH INTEREST {ON BOTH NATIONAL AND PARISH OCCASIONS. PUBLIC HOUSES ARE WELL PATRONISED AS THE NEW"PUB GRUB" AND SOME LAWS HAVE MADE IT A FAMILY PLACE.{" HAVE ANOTHER {BEER,MY DISTANT INQUISITIVE FRIEND "
